fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Give someone your doll at night. Only usable on Night 1 or if you come back into possession of your doll.
- Force your doll onto another player at night (1 use).
- Choose to roleblock the player with your doll at night (2 use).

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Players that receive your doll will be notified that they have come into possession of a creepy doll.
- The player who possesses your doll may choose to give the doll to another player during the night. They may not do this alongside their normal night ability unless they can multitask.
- Forcing the doll onto another player will override the decision of the player with the doll. They will be notified if this is the case.
- When you roleblock the player with your doll, you will also learn their identity.
- If the player with your doll is lynched, you will come into possession with the doll again at the beginning of the night and may choose another player to receive the doll.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have the player in possession of your doll die at night.
